name: Gnomes vs Omnions
description:
GGJ2023 Entry @BUG, theme: Roots

How to play

  • Click underground tiles to select next tile to root
  • You can see how many roots you have on top-left side
  • You can see how many branches you have left on top-left side
  • Rooting a tile boosts tree, strengthening Omnions defense against Gnomes
  • Collecting branches allows tree to fully grow new branches
  • Fully grown branches spawn Omnions on top for defense
  • Growth speed affect how fast the tree grows vertically
  • Root speed increases how fast it can root tiles

Enjoy!

Credits:
